title: Oile of scorpions The miseries of these times turned into medicines and curing themselues. By Francis Rous.
author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.
publisher: Printed by W. Stansby for Iohn Parker, and are to bee sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the three Pigeons,
notes: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
